name: The Forest Below (NamdalsGameDev)
description:
A casual story/platformer game set in a magical forest. You control a lost little girl and a large stone golem trying to help her. Together you have to get through the foreign and dangerous forest

Controls:

Use the mouse during the intro.

A and D to move,  Q to switch between characters.

As the girl press space to jump.

As the golem press space to pick up girl (if close enough).

Credits

Music: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3k2F8fcWJrEw0txZ8EcsjE?si=0bF1vP0hTjC9aIn5VbHzWA
